Job Position: Social Media / Content Creation Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Abuja (FCT)

Job Summary


	We are looking for a creative and passionate Social Media &amp; Content Creator Manager to join our team!
	If you love telling stories, connecting with people online, and turning great ideas into awesome content, this role is for you.
	You&#39;ll be the voice of our brand, helping us grow our community and share our message in a fun, engaging way.

	Your duties will be ablend of creativity, strategic, and analytical tasks.
	Creativity and production duties-You&#39;ll create, edit, and publish daily content (like posts, videos, and stories) across all our social media channels (Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, LinkedIn, etc.).

	Measure what works: Track and analyze how our content is performing using simple analytics tools. You&#39;ll share what&#39;s working and what we can improve.
	Manage campaigns: Run social media campaigns and contests to boost engagement and grow our audience.





Education &amp; Experience


	A Degree from a reputable university with theright skills and experience.
	Proven experience managing social media accounts for a brand or organization.

	Natural Creator: You must have a passion for writing catchy captions, designing eye-catching visuals, and shooting great videos.
	Social media savvy: You know how each social media platform works and what kind of content thrives on each one.
	Detail-oriented: You havekeen eye for spelling, grammar, and a consistent brand voice.
	Great communicator:Ability toexpress ideas clearly and have a friendly, engaging tone.
	Creative and innovative:Thinkingof new and exciting ways to engage our audience.


Additional Advantages:


	Basic design skills
	Video editing skills.


Method of Application

        Marquis Concierge Limited offers both individual and cooperate concierge services ranging from bespoke travel and tour servivces, event planning, luxury personal shopping, facility managent, HAJJ packages, visa assistance and real estate.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media / Content Creation Manager

Job Location: Abuja (FCT)

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are looking for a creative and passionate Social Media & Content Creator Manager to join our team!
	If you love telling stories, connecting with people online, and turning great ideas into awesome content, this role is for you.
	You'll be the voice of our brand, helping us grow our community and share our message in a fun, engaging way.


Responsibilities


	Your duties will be ablend of creativity, strategic, and analytical tasks.
	Creativity and production duties-You'll create, edit, and publish daily content (like posts, videos, and stories) across all our social media channels (Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, LinkedIn, etc.).
	Planning and strategizing: Develop a content calendar and a social media strategy that aligns with our goals. You'll plan what we post and when we post it.
	Communality and engagement duties : Respond to comments, messages, and questions in a friendly, helpful, and timely manner.
	Measure what works: Track and analyze how our content is performing using simple analytics tools. You'll share what's working and what we can improve.
	Manage campaigns: Run social media campaigns and contests to boost engagement and grow our audience.





Education & Experience


	A Degree from a reputable university with theright skills and experience.
	Proven experience managing social media accounts for a brand or organization.


Skills needed:


	Natural Creator: You must have a passion for writing catchy captions, designing eye-catching visuals, and shooting great videos.
	Social media savvy: You know how each social media platform works and what kind of content thrives on each one.
	Detail-oriented: You havekeen eye for spelling, grammar, and a consistent brand voice.
	Great communicator:Ability toexpress ideas clearly and have a friendly, engaging tone.
	Creative and innovative:Thinkingof new and exciting ways to engage our audience.


Additional Advantages:


	Basic design skills
	Video editing skills.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their resumes and cover letters to: marquisconciergehr@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

  "title": "Account Officer",
  "description": "Rainoil Limited is an integrated downstream oil and gas company. A prominent player in the Nigerian industry, the company&rsquo;s operations span across the downstream value chain i.e. Petroleum Product Storage, Haulage/Distribution and Retail Sales. Our primary products include Petrol (PMS), Diesel (AGO) and Kerosene (DPK).

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Account Officer

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos&nbsp;
Employment Type: Full-time

Job&nbsp;Description


	Handles all aspects of assigned bookkeeping activities such as reconciliations, journals and nominal ledger administration by updating the accounting application with transactions as they occur
	Executes measures to ensure that the company&rsquo;s receivables are effectively monitored and are kept to the minimum
	Processes cash book transactions and prepares bank reconciliation
	Documents and updates records of all fixed assets to ensure assets are properly valued, accounted for and safeguarded
	Computes direct expenses as well as proper booking of all expenses
	Monitors of Rainoil&rsquo;s budget by performance evaluation and analysis of variances
	Manages invoices with respect to truck activities
	Prepares of the year end performance report showing the closing balances for assets, liabilities, cash and stock.
	Prepares periodic accounts as well as the group&rsquo;s statement of financial position at the end of the financial year.


Responsibilities


	Handles all aspects of assigned bookkeeping activities such as reconciliations, journals and nominal ledger administration by updating the accounting application with transactions as they occur
	Executes measures to ensure that the company&rsquo;s receivables are effectively monitored and are kept to the minimum
	Processes cash book transactions and prepares bank reconciliation
	Documents and updates records of all fixed assets to ensure assets are properly valued, accounted for and safeguarded
	Computes direct expenses as well as proper booking of all expenses

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Account Officer

Job Location: Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

            
    




	Handles all aspects of assigned bookkeeping activities such as reconciliations, journals and nominal ledger administration by updating the accounting application with transactions as they occur
	Executes measures to ensure that the company’s receivables are effectively monitored and are kept to the minimum

	Manages invoices with respect to truck activities

Account Officer Job at NIPCO Gas Limited




        
    

        
        NIPCO Gas Limited is a 100% subsidiary of NIPCO Plc,a foremost downstream oil company,which is one of the largest downstream fuel distribution and marketing companies in Nigeria.NIPCO Gas in partnership with the NNPC Gas Marketing Limited (NGML) is distributing and supplying Natural Gas to various Industrial & Commercial customers in Ogun State, Edo State and Abuja FCT and in process of expansion of gas distribution network to Oyo State & Lagos State. NIPCO Gas has a very robust infrastructure of Gas Distribution and caters to customer’s energy need across 22 states and FCT Abuja in Nigeria.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Account Officer 
     

            
    



Job Locations: Ajaokuta, Kogi and Apapa, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Assist with the preparation and analysis of financial statements, reports, and budgets.
	Maintain accurate and organized financial records, including journal entries, ledgers, and accounts receivable/payable.
	Reconcile financial transactions, accounts, and discrepancies to ensure accuracy and integrity of financial data.
	Assist with month-end and year-end closing processes,including reconciliations, adjustments, and accruals.
	Prepare and process invoices, payments, expense reports, and other financial transactions.
	Monitor and track financial transactions, expenses, and budgets to ensure compliance with regulations and company policies.
	Provide support and assistance to auditors, tax professionals, and regulatory agencies during audits and examinations.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a B.Sc with 3 - 4 years of work experience.


Salary
N250,000 - N300,000 / month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: bello@nipcogas.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
